content:
For the impact on Mykolaivka, Donetsk region, the Russians used four managed airplaces of the UMPB D-30SN.

About thisIn the evening of March 28 reportedHead of Donetsk Regional Military Administration Vadim Filashkin.

As a result of the attack, a woman born in 1958 was killed, at least 11 high-rise buildings and 11 private houses were damaged.

Asreported the armyinform, ammunition, which the Russians hit Kharkov can fly up to 90 km.
title: The enemy applied the same managed ammunition in Donetsk region that he beat Kharkiv yesterday
description: This was announced on the evening of March 28 by the head of the Donetsk Regional Military Administration ...
author: Army Inform
